ygData.subject: Re: Help w/ Dismal Rage quests (poss spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I managed to find and kill the NPC Messenger, and return the note, and received the quest for the Bayle List.  Two things I notice as odd, was the quest
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I managed to find and kill the NPC Messenger, and return
the note, and received the quest for the Bayle List. Two things
I notice as odd, was the quest text had [Bayle List], but I couldn't
get him to go any further, and the quest told me to bring back her
Bayle List III. I killed her just for good measure, no list there.

On another note, it seems like there must be a use for the other two
Bayle Lists. Does anyone know if the Bayle List that Mammoth (the
bear in Surefall) is rumored to carry is Bayle List III, or is
it a totally unrelated item? I wonder if there is someone you can
turn all 3 parts in to? Or a way to read/translate them...

Xilith
